thread.section_title: KatchAKid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KatchAKid | katchakid.com
thread.title: Brooke Clark

author: Brooke Clark
title: Brooke Clark
text:
Robert was patient with me during the estimate as I had other contractors out to my home at the same time. He took the time to explain the net and process to me which was helpful in making the decision to use their product. The installers were super friendly and knowledgeable about putting the net on and taking it off. Love the way it looks over the pool and it saved the dog from falling in the day after they installed it!
I will say that it is somewhat of a chore to remove the net to clean the pool but knowing my kids are safe makes it worth it.
